privacy.intro: This Privacy Policy explains how ADSEGOM LTD collects, uses, and discloses information about you when you use Love Your Home.
section_1_a_list: User Content: Photos of rooms or spaces you upload for AI processing.
section_1_b_list: Anonymous Identifiers: App User IDs for subscription management.
section_2_list: Process AI Requests: To generate interior and exterior design styles as requested.
Image Usage: We use the data in your uploaded photos solely to apply the AI design effects you request. We do not use this data for authentication or tracking.
Data is shared with AI providers only for the duration of the generation process.
privacy.section_3_text: We do not sell your personal data. We share data only with AI Providers (for processing), Backend Infrastructure (for storage), and for Legal Requirements.
section_4_list: Images are converted and sent to AI providers securely.
Retention: We do NOT permanently store your source images after processing.
Data Policy: We do not sell, trade, or transfer your image data to third parties.
We retain anonymous account info while active.
privacy.section_5_text: We use industry-standard security measures. However, no internet transmission is 100% secure.
privacy.section_6_text: You may request deletion of your account and data within the app or by contacting us.
privacy.section_7_text: The App is not intended for children under 18. We do not knowingly collect info from children.
privacy.section_8_text: We may update this policy. We will notify you of changes.
